channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: I have $50,000 in credit-card debt after my divorce, but received $30,000 after a car wreck. Do I buy a used Lexus?
item.description: “I previously drove a fully loaded BMW X7, and driving a used Lexus feels like a big drop.”

item.title: Virgin Galactic’s stock is skyrocketing. This is why.
item.description: Space-tourism company Virgin Galactic expects private astronauts to pay more than $600,000 for a ticket on its new Delta-class SpaceShips

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.
